issues.description: obsOffsets defines CDT, CST, MDT, MST, PDT and PST with positive values (e.g., CDT: 5 * 60). These time zones are west of UTC and must be negative. Parsed dates will be offset in the wrong direction.
obsOffsets lacks an entry for the 'UT' timezone. When the string contains 'UT', calculateOffset returns undefined, leaving the parsed offset invalid.
